name: TDCLG

name: TMCHW
description: turbulent transfer coefficient of heat at the surface (water)

name: QRES

description: fraction of frozen soil (layers analogous soil temp.)

description: fraction of frozen soil (layers analogous soil temp.)

description: fraction of frozen soil (layers analogous soil temp.)
